title: Mastering Core Anatomy Concepts Using Blended Teaching Methods

context.prior_knowledge: Basic medical terminology and fundamental understanding of human anatomy
context.additional_context: Design Considering Non-Face-to-Face Environments and Limited Practical Resources for COVID-19 Response. Emphasizes Workplace Relevance for Current Clinical Practitioners

learning_goals: Explain major structure-function relationships in anatomy with over 85% accuracy according to Gagné’s Nine Events of Instruction
Analyze and simulate clinical cases like Frey syndrome in real-time by applying Peyton’s Four-Step Approach
Reconstruct anatomical concepts three or more times through peer feedback exchanges using online collaboration tools
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
